SEARCH
程序包 com.shapeville.gui.shapes

类 CircleDrawer

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.gui.shapes.CircleDrawer
public class CircleDrawer extends Object
A utility class for drawing circles with radius or diameter measurements. This class provides functionality to draw circles with customizable dimensions and visual properties such as colors and measurements display.
从以下版本开始:
2025-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CircleDrawer

      public CircleDrawer()
      Constructs a new CircleDrawer with default values. Initializes the measurement value to 0 and sets measurement type to radius.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setValues

      public void setValues(double value, boolean isRadius)
      Sets the measurement value and type for the circle.
      参数:
      value - The measurement value to set
      isRadius - True if the value represents radius, false if it represents diameter

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, int width, int height)
      Draws the circle with its measurements in the specified graphics context. The circle is drawn centered in the provided dimensions with either radius or diameter measurement displayed.
      参数:
      g - The graphics context to draw on
      width - The width of the drawing area
      height - The height of the drawing area

    • drawText

      private void drawText(Graphics2D g2d, String text, int x, int y)
      Draws text centered at the specified coordinates.
      参数:
      g2d - The graphics context to draw on
      text - The text to draw
      x - The x-coordinate for text placement
      y - The y-coordinate for text placement
